name: Human, anti-human
description:
oil on canvas ,100 * 150 cm, 2011 , . The greatest discovery of mankind, against mankind! This is funny, isn't it?
The explosion zone of nuclear bombs is divided into five parts: 1- Evaporation zone 2- Total destruction zone 3- Severe heat damage zone 4- Explosive severe damage zone 5- Severe wind and fire damage zone. In the evaporation zone, a temperature of 300 million degrees Celsius is created, and everything, from metal to humans and animals, does not catch fire at this temperature, but evaporates.
